https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/v3VLfKr5TFeqf9Th4RI9LNdx0cC.jpg Santiago returns home from the Peruvian army ill-prepared to cope with the realities of life. Haunted by his violent military past, he is conflicted by his desire for education and his temptation to join his comrades in a decadent life of crime. Days of Santiago
